byline.original: By NOUR YOUSSEF and NICOLA CLARK

abstract: Egyptian investigators say searchers have recovered cockpit voice recorder from EgyptAir Flight 804, which crashed in Mediterranean; hope information can be extracted from damaged device and synchronized with data from still-missing flight data recorder in order to reconstruct final moments.
lead_paragraph: The cockpit voice recorder from a flight that crashed as it flew from Paris to Cairo last month was damaged, investigators said.

headline.print_headline: EgyptAir Jet’s ‘Black Box’ Is Found in Mediterranean

snippet: The cockpit voice recorder from a flight that crashed as it flew from Paris to Cairo last month was damaged, investigators said.
